item.title: Possum & Pams Giftware
item.desc:
We may be small but we have it all! Fabulous gifts for you and your home. Friendly customer service can help you find the perfect gift. We have a fabulous selection for all ages and budgets. Complimentary gift wrapping. Open 7 days 9.30am - 5pm
Contacts: Deb 027 245 7750 / Pam 027 406 3331
